thread.title: Days Away From Democratic Debate, All Eyes On An Undecided Biden
thread.title_full: Days Away From Democratic Debate, All Eyes On An Undecided Biden : NPR

author: Mara Liasson
title: Days Away From Democratic Debate, All Eyes On An Undecided Biden
text: The first Democratic presidential debate is set for Tuesday, even as Vice President Joe Biden is considering whether to join the White House race. NPR's Mara Liasson sets up the showdown, and explains how the field is preparing for Biden's decision days before the event.
